thread.title: affordable and great location! - free water and coffee
thread.title_full: affordable and great location! - free water and coffee - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ina A
title: affordable and great location! - free water and coffee
text:
This hotel is decent and not pricey at all for manhattan standards.
The hotel's decor is sooo artsy and interesting.
The 1 king bedroom accommodates 1-2 people. Bathroom is a little tight and shower head is not removable but not really a big deal. It is near everything - shopping, lots of great restos, and subway.
Lobby is huge and perfect for entertaining large groups of friends. Elevators do not need key cards to go up to your floor.
Staff were really friendly and accommodating. Theyre very considerate and always lending a helping hand. Housekeeping did a great job in keeping my room neat and organized.
